arguments.argument:
randomXStart=random_range(room_width/scaleFactor,sprite_get_width(sprite_index)-(room_width/scaleFactor)) randomYStart=random_range(room_height/scaleFactor-20,sprite_get_height(sprite_index)-(room_height/scaleFactor)+20) randomDir=irandom_range(0,359) randomSpeed=random_range(0.7,2.5)*global.delta_factor//*(60/room_speed) randomTime=random_range(10,20)
x=room_width - ((randomXStart*scaleFactor))*1.2 y=room_height - ((randomYStart*scaleFactor))*1.2 startx=x starty=y direction=randomDir speed=randomSpeed
